extension.description: A convenient addon to download subtitles from subscene.com. If you find it useful, please consider giving it a star in github. This is being actively maintained. In case of any problem, feel free to open an issue on github.
extension.news: Version 1.2.* - New: Subscene domain name can be selected from the settings. Version 1.1.* - New: Subscene plus now works with TV shows. - New: When Movie/TV-show cannot be determined accurately, It allows you to select the correct one from a list. - New: Subtitles from archives with multiple items can be selected from a list. - Minor bugfixes
